items.title: Christian Playwriting

visible_instructors.name: Cleveland
visible_instructors.title: Cleveland McLeish
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Christian Author, Playwright and Screenwriter

items.headline: Learn how to tell a story that is theatrical and produce-able from a Christian perspective.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will have a completed first draft of a full length play.
In this course you will learn the basics of playwriting, i.e. theme, structure, character, plot, climax.
Adapt a practical approach to writing, making it a lifestyle and not just a hobby.

Use Linguistic Focus to polish your writing
